original: himapayaḥśaṅkhādyāśrayeṣu paramārthato bhinneṣu śuklādiṣu yadvaśena śuklaḥ śukla ityādyabhinnābhidhānapratyayotpattistat śuklatvādi sāmānyam
analyzed: hima payaḥ śaṅkha ādi āśrayeṣu paramārthataḥ bhinneṣu śukla ādiṣu yad vaśena śuklaḥ śuklaḥ ityādi abhinna abhidhāna pratyaya utpattiḥ tat śukla tva ādi sāmānyam

sā āropā anyā tu yatra uktau viṣayī viṣayasya athā
āropyamāṇaḥ

original: āropaviṣayaśva yatrānapahnutabhedau sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete sā lakṣaṇā sāropā //

viṣayiṇā āropyamāṇena antar kṛte nigīrṇe
anyasmin āropa viṣaye sati sa adhyavasānā syāt
sū

original: anyatra vrajatīti kā khalu kathā nāpyasya tādṛk suhad yo māṃ necchati nāgataśva hahahā ko 'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ /

nipetuḥ āsyāt iva tasya dīptāḥ śarāḥ dhanuḥ maṇḍala madhya bhājaḥ
jājvalyamānāḥ iva vāri dhārāḥ dina ardha bhājaḥ pariveṣiṇaḥ rkāt  /

original: atrāpi jvalantyo 'mbudhārāḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣpatantyo na saṃbhavantītyupanibadhyamāno 'rtho 'naucityameva puṣṇāti //
analyzed: atra api jvalantyaḥ mbu dhārāḥ sūrya maṇḍalāt niṣpatantyaḥ na saṃbhavanti iti upanibadhyamānaḥ rthaḥ na aucityam eva puṣṇāti

original: utprekṣāyāmapi saṃbhāvanaṃ dhruvevādaya eva śabdā vaktuṃ sahante na yathāśabdo 'pi
analyzed: utprekṣāyām api saṃbhāvanam dhruva iva ādayaḥ eva śabdāḥ vaktum sahante na

original: kevalasyāsya sādharmyameva pratipādayituṃ paryāptatvāt tasya cāsyāmavivakṣitatvāditi
analyzed: kevalasya asya sādharmyam eva pratipādayitum paryāpta tvāt tasya ca asyām avivakṣita tvāt iti
tatra aśaktiḥ asya avācaka tvam doṣaḥ
yathā udyayau dīrghikā garbhāt mukulam mecaka utpalam
nārī locana cāturya śṅkā saṃkucitam yathā

original: utprekṣitamapi tācvikena rupeṇa parivarjitatvāt nirupākhyaprakhyam tatsamarthanāya yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālokhyamiva gaganatale 'tyantamasamīcīnamiti
analyzed: utprekṣitam api tācvikena rupeṇa parivarjita tvāt nirupākhya prakhyam tad samarthanāya yat artha antara nyāsa upādānam tat ālokhyam iva gagana tale tyantam asamīcīnam iti
anucita artha tā eva dauṣaḥ

original: yathā divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītamivāndhakāram /
analyzed: yathā divākarāt rakṣati yaḥ guhāsu līnam divā bhītam iva andhakāram

original: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva // 600 //
analyzed: kṣudre pi nūnam śaraṇam prapanne prapanne mamatvam uccais śirasām atīva

original: atrācetanasya tamaso divākarāttrāsa eva na saṃbhavatīti kuta eva tatprayojitamadriṇā paritrāṇam /
analyzed: atra acetanasya tamasaḥ divākarāt trāsaḥ eva na saṃbhavati iti kutas eva tat prayojitam adriṇā paritrāṇam

original: saṃbhāvitena tu rūteṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti vyartha eva tatsamarthanāyāṃ yatnaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhāvitena tu rūteṇa pratibhāsamānasya asya na kācid anupapattiḥ avatarati iti vyarthaḥ eva tad samarthanāyām yatnaḥ
sādhāraṇa viśeṣaṇa vaśāt eva samāsoktiḥ anuktam api

original: upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ punaruktaṃ vā doṣaḥ /
analyzed: upamāna viśeṣam prakāśayati iti tasya atra punar upādāne prayojana abhāvāt anupādeya tvam yat tat apuṣṭa artha tvam punaruktam vā doṣaḥ

original: yathā spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karairdayitayeva vijṛmbhitatāpayā /
analyzed: yathā spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karaiḥ dayitayā iva vijṛmbhita tāpayā
a tanu māna parigrahayā sthitam rucirayā cirayā api dina śriyā

original: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca yathā sadṛśaviśeṣaṇavaśena vyaktiviśeṣaparigraheṇa ca nāyakatayā nāyikātvena ca vyaktiḥ,
analyzed: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhām ca yathā sadṛśa viśeṣaṇa vaśena vyakti viśeṣa parigraheṇa ca nāyaka tayā nāyikā tvena ca vyaktiḥ

original: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratīnāyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
analyzed: tathā grīṣma divasa śriyaḥ pi pratīnāyikā tvena bhaviṣyati iti kim dayitayā iti sva śabda upādānena
śleṣa upamāyāḥ tu sa viṣayaḥ

original: yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ /
analyzed: yatra upamānasya upādānam antareṇa sādhāraṇeṣu api viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ
yathā svayam ca pallava ātāmra bhāsvat kara virājitā
iti

original: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam /
analyzed: aprastuta praśaṃsāyām api upameyam anayā eva rītyā pratītam na punar prayogeṇa kadartha tām neyam

original: yathā āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vāvasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
analyzed: yathā āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśakaḥ puras vāryate madhyevāridhi vāvasan tṛṇamaṇiḥ dhatte maṇīnām rucam

original: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatacvāntaram // 603 //
analyzed: khadyotaḥ pi na kampate pracalitum madhye pi tejasvinām dhik sāmānyam acetanam prabhum iva an āmṛṣṭa tacva antaram  /

original: a6, acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
analyzed: acetanasya prabhoḥ aprastuta viśiṣṭa sāmānya dvāreṇa abhivyaktau na yuktam eva punar kathanam
tat ete laṃkāra doṣāḥ
yathā asaṃbhavinaḥ nye pi evaṃjātīyakāḥ pūrva uktayā eva doṣa jātyā
antarbhāvitāḥ
na pṛthak pratipādanam arhanti iti saṃpūrṇam idam kāvya lakṣaṇam

original: ityeṣa mārgo viduṣāṃ vibhinno 'pyabhinnarūpaḥ pratimāsate yat /
analyzed: iti eṣa mārgaḥ viduṣām vibhinnaḥ u pi abhinna rūpaḥ pratimāsate yat

original: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//
analyzed: na tat vicitram yat amutra samyak vinirmitā saṃghaṭanā eva hetuḥ
iti kāvyaprakāśe rthālaṃkāranirṇayaḥ nāma daśamaḥ ullāsaḥ
samāptaḥ śva ayam kāvya prakāśaḥ
